



** Please check uvw_FW_USER when upgrade engine to make sure users that belong to deleted distributor not able to login.
** In order to view the map, please open "Default.aspx" in any text editor, then put a script tag in side of <head> tag.
** Script to put : <script type="text/javascript" src="http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?sensor=false"></script>
** Script to put : <script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="Sys/JavaScript/oms.min.js"></script>
** In order to view the map with OverlappingMarkerSpiderfier feature, please ensure the javascript - "oms.min.js" is include in C:\R5OfficeEngine_xxxx\Sys\JavaScript\
** Map feature: ImgHandler.ashx is added to display customer image from binary and this file need to place in ROOT of engine folder.
** Engine Extraction Guide: When extracted the engine file, you would need to unblock the security.
** Example: Right click the Engine zip file, click the Unblock button near security "This file came from another computer and might be blocked to help protect this computer."
** To enable Data Archive module, please include Archive database connection string in web.config under <connectionStrings> as below:
	<add name="DataArchive" connectionString="Data Source=10.194.122.141;uid=sa;pwd=@cN!nPm#31@2o13;Initial Catalog=DMS_DataArchiving;" providerName="System.Data.SqlClient" />
**

<Nuran>
1.	Ticket#2018032755000335 — order screen route plan is mandatory.kindly remove mandatory route plan option
	Issue: Main_WHS is blank.
	Root Cause: SLSMAN_CD value in getSlsmanBUWhs() is blank.
	Resolution: Switch validateCust() and onCustChanged().

	File Changed: 
	- Office\Modules\Txn\mod_IT_OrderDtl\pag_TO_NewGeneral_IT.page
===========================================================

Date              : 2018-03-28
Baseline version  : 8.3.1.0.20180328
Available in      : 8.3.1.0.20180328A
Engine Version    : R5OfficeEngine_5.8.0.14.Net4.0_TEST20170328
Builder Version   : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.18_TEST20170413

<Nuran>
1.	Ticket#2018021355000425 — Problem Ticket : Route Plan getting change
	Issue: Route Plan shows details from other distributor (who successfully update the Route Plan).
	Root Cause: Other distributor overwrite @selDistCd, @selCycleCd value in Update statement.
	Resolution: Replace the values to 'Global.SesObj.gDistCd', 'pag_MRP_Listing.selCycleCd'.

	File Changed: 
	- Office\Modules\Master\mod_RoutePlan\pag_MRP_EditGeneral.page
===========================================================

Date              : 2018-03-28
Baseline version  : 8.3.1.0.20180320
Available in      : 8.3.1.0.20180328

Builder Version   : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.18_TEST20170413

<Nuran>
1.	Ticket#2018032755000335 — order screen route plan is mandatory.kindly remove mandatory route plan option

	- Office\Modules\Txn\mod_IT_OrderDtl\pag_TO_NewGeneral_IT.page

<Nuran>
1.	Ticket#2018031955000234 — Should reflect only mapped distributors in VMI
	Issue: Distributor Filter shows all distributors
	Root Cause: DIST_CD = 'HQ', therefore it shows all distributors
	Resolution: Include #Global.SesObj.gUserID#, #SES.POS_ID# in WHERE clause

	File Changed: 
	- Office\Modules\Common\popup\mod_Common\pag_SelSubDist.page

Builder Version   : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.18_TEST20170413

<Nuran>
1.	Ticket#2018020555000324 — Dashboard - Should show total values of assigned distributors
	Issue: Total Sales shows all sales from all distributors.
	Root Cause: No SYS_USER_TREE table - to filter the distributors.
	Resolution: Include SYS_USER_TREE table in SqlCommand, where TotalSales are calculated from assigned distributors only.

	File Changed: 
	- Office\Modules\Dashboard\pag_D_Business_HQ.page

3. Bug 27769:[Dyn UD] >Dynamic User Define >Edit mode >1)Positions jumbled up when click [Move Up]/ [Move Down], 2)Selected field moved to wrong position, 3)Some fields missing in related module

Solution: Set the data type of the position data to int before perform the sorting.

<Ben>
1. FIX 16249 : [Auto]STD Inventory>Bin Transfer: If add product with 3 UOM or more, the 3rd UOM will be displayed in another row
Root Cause: TXN_DT for 3 UOMs have different milliseconds causing group by to get multiple rows
Solution: convert milliseconds to :000 so group by can get all in 1 record

<Chuah>
1. Bug 15988:BO: STD 8.1.3: After return is calculated, these errors happen: negative net amount for Selling product, selling product with Zero QTY, and negative Gross total.
Root Cause: When Selling and FOC are same product, the discount amount will update to TXN_INVBAL_PROMO
Solution: Filter out MECHANIC_TYPE=1 when insert to TXN_INVBAL_PROMO
File Changed: pag_T_CreditNote, pag_TCN_NewGeneral_IT, pag_TCN_EditGeneral_IT, pag_TCN_EditGeneral, pag_TCN_NewGeneral


2. Bug 15932:BO: STD 8.1.3: BLOCK: Error prevents user from creating credit note which returns products to two different warehouses
Root Cause: Delete temp table for batch when the temp table not exists because the product not assign to manage warehouse
Solution: Check temp table exists before delete
File Changed: pag_TCN_NewGeneral_IT, pag_TCN_EditGeneral_IT, pag_TCN_EditGeneral, pag_TCN_NewGeneral

1. 0074483: 2UOM[Client/INDIA/NON INDIA]> Return: Decimal storing issue

<Venice>
1. 0073195: BO>Txn>NewCustomerApproval - The Tax Exemption field radio button show wrong info compare to the DB table value
Root Cause: Data type does not map correctly with radiobutton options value
Solution: change data type from string to number and cast CUST_TAX to int in grid select command
File Changed: pag_T_NewCustomerApprovalEntry

2. Issue: BO > NewCustomerApproval / NewCustomer - Auto-generate button for Customer Code does not generate correct running no.
Root Cause: the blank and longer in use CUST_CD_PREFIX value from MST_DISTOPTION is passed in the global function to check duplication of txn no. 
Solution: pass in DIST_PREFIX from MST_DIST instead of CUST_CD_PREFIX 
File Changed: pag_MC_NewGeneral, pag_T_NewCustomerApprovalEntry

3. Issue: BO > NewCustomerApproval - dist prefix label value is gone after click reset button.
Root Cause: dist prefix label value does not repopulate after reset button is clicked
Solution: repopulate the dist prefix label value
File Changed: pag_T_NewCustomerApprovalEntry

4. Issue: BO > NewCustomerApproval - geo node assignment in grid is gone in view detail page after approved or rejected
Root Cause: after approve a customer, cust_cd in TXN_NEWCUST_GEO is changed to the approved cust code. But the select command in geo node grid still refer to old cust cd.
Solution: inner join TXN_NEWCUST on APPR_CUST_CD or CUST_CD
File Changed: pag_T_NewCustomerApproval

1. 0070526: (STD/India) Sales Order/Invoice> TXN_ORDPROMO and TXN_INVPROMO does not show all selling product when each tier assign with diff prd

- TXN_INV_ALLOCFOC.PROMO_FREQ

Solution: order by promo index desc, product code, UOM

=========================================================

Date        	  : 2015-12-17
Baseline version  : 8.0.0.2.20151217A
Available in      : 8.0.0.2.20151217B
Engine Version    : R5OfficeEngine_5.8.0.10.Net4.0
Builder Version   : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.14_TEST20151105

<Vivian>
1. FOC product index and frequency
Remark: Changes only effective for Order/Invoice created from this version onwards, no patching for previous records as can't cater for multi tier promotion.
FOC product index - to match with Order/Invoice Product table's PRD_INDEX.
Frequency - to store each promotion tier hits how many times in an Order/Invoice.
RootCause1: Order/Invoice Product table's PRD_INDEX are not tally with Order/Invoice Promo table's PRD_INDEX when there is multi tier promotion having the same FOC product for each tier
RootCause2: Promotion frequency in CR23A_PROMOTION_PERIOD_REPORT does not cater how many times each promotion hits in an Order/Invoice
Solution: store data to new columns
- TXN_ORDPROMO.ORDPRD_INDEX
- TXN_ORD_ALLOCFOC.PROMO_FREQ
- TXN_INVPROMO.INVPRD_INDEX
- TXN_INV_ALLOCFOC.PROMO_FREQ
- MST_REBATEFOC.PROMO_FREQ
File Changed: Promotion.gcs, pag_TO_EditGeneral, pag_TO_NewGeneral, pag_TI_EditGeneral, pag_TI_NewGeneral, pag_T_SelPromo, pag_MPromo_SelFocList

2. Product index for promotion multi tier in TXN_ORDPRD and TXN_INVDTL tables should order by higher tier followed by lower tier (same as HHT)
RootCause: previously order by product code, UOM, promo index
Solution: order by promo index desc, product code, UOM
File Changed: Promotion.gcs

=========================================================
Date        	  : 2015-12-17
Baseline version  : 8.0.0.2.20151217
Available in      : 8.0.0.2.20151217A
Engine Version    : R5OfficeEngine_5.8.0.10.Net4.0
Builder Version   : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.14_TEST20151105

<Vivian>
1. 0070088: Transaction > Order > New - Buy product with insufficient FOC is not highlighted in green color, Insufficient FOC product is not 
Issue 1:
- RootCause: didn't cater to highlight inactive product in Orange
- Solution: added to highlight inactive product in Orange in temp invoice
File Changed: pag_TI_EditGeneral
Issue 2:
- Remark: Promotion will only be highlighted in light brown colour at Select Promotion page, provided the Edit Order is already applied/saved that promotion (Delivery date is greater than Promotion Date')
Issue 3:
- Remark: Promotion will only be highlighted in purple colour at Select Promotion page, provided the Edit Order is already applied/saved that promotion (FOC promo which is insufficient)
Other Issues:
Transaction > Edit Order - Apply a new promotion for insufficient FOC, Buy product with insufficient FOC is not highlighted in green colour
- RootCause: only highlight green colour for existing database record
- Solution: highlight green colour for both newly added and existing record in Edit Order for Buy product with insufficient FOC
- File Changed: pag_TO_EditGeneral
Transaction > Add Order - Apply a promotion, Buy product is highlighted in green colour although FOC quantity is sufficient
- RootCause: missing insufficient quantity condition
- Solution: added insufficient quantity condition

=========================================================

Date        	  : 2015-12-08
Baseline version  : 8.0.0.1.20151208E
Available in      : 8.0.0.1.20151208F
Engine Version   : R5OfficeEngine_5.8.0.10.Net4.0
Builder Version  : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.14_TEST20151105

<Jess>
1. Mantis ID: 0069869: Setting > Step of Call > Customer Assignment > Auto populated outlet type is not being filtered in Add
   Root Cause: This only happened in default profile. By Default, all the outlet type will be assigned to default profile.
	There are 3 default profile created for van sales, pre-sales and merchandiser. 
	This default profile is not allow to delete, but can only edit activities. Others information such as date, status and operation type and customer assignment is not allow to change. 
	This is to make sure there will be a default profile enable when no other profile valid for the salesman’s customer. 
   Solution:  Doesn't allow to edit the General info & customer assignment for default profile. 
   Page Changed: pag_SS_EditGeneral, pag_SS_CustAssign


2. Mantis ID: 0069831: [Office]Transaction>Add Credit Note/Inventory modules > Assign bin batch: Upon tabbing into Expiry Date, BO hang
   Issue #1: the cursor lost focus upon tabbing from Batch Code
   Root Cause: Doesn't set focus on expiry date on the batch code onTextChanged event
   Solution: Set the focus on expiry date on the batch code onTextChanged event
   Page Changed: pag_TCN_AssignBinBatch

<Jess>
1. Mantis ID: 0069871: [Office]>Exchange>Assign Bin Batch: Inventory and batch did not refresh properly after selecting product
   Issue #1: Select each product and assign the bin and batch. Noticed the inventory quantity did not refresh properly 
   Root Cause: Doesn't reset the value 
   Solution: Reset the value for batch, expired date and current inventory quantity
   Page Changed: pag_Exch_AssignBinBatchOut

   Issue #2: no checking based on the backed invt_batch for each product.  
   Solution: Add checking, only display those product that has inventory in batch. 
	     Also add the same checking when select exchange out product. Prompt an message to alert there is no inventory found for this product selected.
   Page Changed: pag_Exch_AssignBinBatchOut, pag_Exch_EditGeneral, pag_Exch_NewGeneral


   Another issue found: All the products in exchange are highlighted in red if one of product is insufficient product quantity. 
   Root Cause: if the product quantity is not equal to 1, it will return empty, all products will always less than exchange quantity
   Solution: Change the checking to if product quantity not equal to empty and not null, then return product quantity
   Page Changed:  pag_Exch_AssignBinBatchOut, pag_Exch_NewGeneral

3. Dynamic Call Card - incorrect date is used for validation checking when system date and getcountrydate have date difference
eg: system date = 2015-11-28 02:35:00, getcountrydate = 2015-11-27 23:35:00
RootCause: was using eng.API.currentUserNow, which is system date
Solution: use dbo.getcountrydate() and dbo.getcountrydateonly()
File Changed: WizardValidator

=========================================================

Date        	  : 2015-11-26
Baseline version  : 8.0.0.0.20151126
Available in      : 8.0.0.0.20151126A
Engine Version   : R5OfficeEngine_5.8.0.10.Net4.0_TEST20151120-a
Builder Version  : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.14_TEST20151105

<Vivian>
1. 0067714: Transaction>Invoice- Unable to update multiple UOM for product with component
RootCause: DecodeHTML for PRD_QTY in grd_n_List.OnDataBound, Convert.ToDecimal is used to retrieve PRD_LISTPRC, incorrect sorting of PRD_INDEX for components, no cater scenario where a component (without valid pricing) tied to the product which is already in the saved Order/temp Invoice at Edit Order/Invoice page
Solution: removed DecodeHTML for PRD_QTY in grd_n_List.OnDataBound (both New and Edit Invoice), use gcs_Global.ToDecimal instead to retrieve PRD_LISTPRC, removed the function to refresh the list of product components during edit Order/Invoice page onPostInit, edited sorting of PRD_INDEX for components, added warning message and grid's Price cell highlighted in Red
File Changed: pag_TO_NewGeneral, pag_TO_EditGeneral, pag_TI_EditGeneral, promotion.gcs
File Added: pag_PopUp_OK2

2.  0067785: Invoice/SalesOrder- No prompt when FOC component has invalid price 
Remark: As per discussed with Wendy, component for FOC product without valid price is allowed. Therefore, the selling price of the FOC component will be 0 and it will prompt a warning message instead of error message, user may proceed as usual or add price in HQ for the component. The grid's Price cell will be highlighted in Red if component tied to the FOC product does not have valid pricing, TXN_ORDPRD.PRICE_ERROR will be updated as 1 for highlighted cell.
RootCause: didn't cater for scenario where FOC component without valid pricing
Solution: added warning message and grid's Price cell highlighted in Red
File Changed: pag_TI_NewGeneral, pag_TI_EditGeneral, pag_TI_ViewGeneral, pag_TO_NewGeneral, pag_TO_EditGeneral, pag_TO_ViewGeneral

<Vivian>
1. 0068380: HQ> Setting | Access Control | Back Office System Profile > found audit trail empty after edit and save
RootCause: Back Office System Profile and Hand Held System Profile are sharing the same function ID
Solution: Split Back Office System Profile and Hand Held System Profile into individual function ID
Remark: SMTP password textbox field's maxlength is set to 0 due to RSA data encryption will populate encrypted value onTextChanged which is length of 172 (more than 50), this caused the user not allowed to save record. Therefore, validation check on SMTP password textbox field is added when clicking Save
File Changed: pag_AC_SystemProfile.page, pag_AC_SystemProfile_HHT.page

2. 0069093: Transaction>Cheque Processing>Did not select anything and click save and extra message come out
RootCause: missing return after prompt "No selection made"
Solution: added return after prompt "No selection made"
File Changed: pag_TC_ChqProcessing

RootCause: missing return after prompt "Total payment amount is greater than receivable amount"
Solution: added return after prompt "Total payment amount is greater than receivable amount"
File Changed: pag_TC_NormalEntry_General_EditN

Builder Version  : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.14_TEST20151105

<Jess>
1. Mantis ID: 0068897: MST > Customer > Openitems > total Outstanding balance is not tally with customer info screen
   
   Issue #1: found the total outstanding balance and detail outstanding balance is not tally. Refer to select OUTSTANDING_BAL from MST_CUST where CUST_CD='50131NG0001007001121'
   Rootcaused: Partial processed and verification collection's cash doesn't deduct from document balance
   Solution: Add two extra label to indicate the Open items amount, and partial processed and verification collection cash amount
   Page Changed: pag_MC_OpenItem


2. Mantis ID: 0069391: Route activities>Click save multiple times in customer assignment to save
   RootCaused: Target duration column's dataType = number and input's character length  = 3. 
	       '.00' will auto appended when any number entered (Eg. 5), the input character length always > 3 once the number has been append with '.00'.
   Solution: Change the dataType = integer and add regular expression which only allowed positive integer and number must greater than zero.
   Page Changed: pag_MRA_Assign_Cust_Add, pag_MRA_Cust_Assign


3. Mantis ID: 0068741: Stock Replenishment>No prompt when replenish qty more than available qty
   RootCaused: The checking has been commented out
   Solution: Uncomment the checking
   Page Changed: pag_VI_StkRepm_New_Bin_Edit


4. Mantis ID: 0068726: Stock Request> No prompt when no batch is selected
   RootCaused: No Checking on this
   Solution: Add checking
   Script Changed: pag_VI_StkReq_Edit_Bin

<Jess>
1. Mantis ID: 0068710: Step of call> Activity not filtered if already assign
   RootCaused: The dropdown box doesn't refresh after step of call activity assigned
   Solution: Refresh dropdown box
   Page Changed: pag_SS_ActivityAssign


2. Mantis ID: 0068751: Step of call> Audit trail missing
   RootCaused: Missing function and page ID in SYS_REF table
   Solution: Add function and page ID into SYS_REF
   Script Changed: 1-INITIAL_DATA


3. Mantis ID: 0068711: Step of call>Up and down arrow key not functioning
   Solution: Sequence arrange will change to pop up page similiar with the route plan module
   Page Changed: pag_S_StepOfCall, pag_SS_ReassignSequence_ActivityAssign, pag_SS_ReassignSequence_MERCActivityAssign


4. Mantis ID: 0068692: Step of call> Activity change automatically when click edit
   RootCaused: List of activity doesn't has the current row  activity code
   Solution: Get the list of activity to include current row activity code
   Page Changed: pag_SS_ActivityAssign

5. Mantis ID: 0068775: Step of call> Issues found in BO
   Issue #1: Record does not updated when status change from active to inactive
     RootCaused: Missing version 
     Solution: Passing in version value
     Page Changed: pag_S_StepOfCall
     Script Changed: 13-FW_SYS_GRID_COL

   Issue #2: Prompt error when change status from inactive to active
     RootCaused: Invalid control name passing
     Solution: Passing valid control name
     Page Changed: pag_S_StepOfCall

   Issue #3: Route activity does not show same level of hierarchy in customer listing as per step of call
     RootCaused: No checking on level of hierarchy in customer listing as per step of call
     Solution: Add checking on level of hierarchy in customer listing as per step of call
     Page Changed: pag_MRA_Assign_Cust_Add, pag_MRA_Cust_Assign

   Issue #4: Hyperlink for merchandising activity has no prompt when no activity is assigned to it. 
     Solution: It will not message prompted, changed to label 'Merchandising Activity setup incomplete' If the activity is not assigned to it.
     Page Changed: pag_SS_ActivityAssign

   Issue #5: According to spec hq user should be able to edit default profile but currently unable to edit default profile 
     RootCaused: Condition checking - Doesn't allowed to edit when is default profile or today > end date
     Solution: Remove default profile condition
     Page Changed: pag_SS_EditGeneral, pag_SS_ActivityAssign, pag_SS_CustAssign

   Issue #6: Hyperlink does not prompt to enable rearrange sequence.
     Solution: Sequence arrange will change to pop up page similiar with the route plan module
     Page Changed: pag_S_StepOfCall, pag_SS_ReassignSequence_ActivityAssign, pag_SS_ReassignSequence_MERCActivityAssign


6. Mantis ID: 0068684: Step of call> Breadcrumb missing for general info and different naming
   Solution: Add those missing breadcrumb 
   Script Changed: pag_SS_EditGeneral, pag_SS_CustAssign, pag_SS_ViewGenera


7. Mantis ID: 0068709: Step of call>Fail to delete activity,customer and profile
    Issue #1: No Prompt deletion summary pop up after delete
     Solution: Add deletion summary pop up 
     Page Changed: pag_S_StepOfCall 
   
    Issue #2: Deleted record not removed directly by own refresh, have to manually refresh page to see record removed.
     Solution: Refresh the grid once deleted
     Page Changed: pag_SS_CustAssign, pag_S_StepOfCall

    Issue #3: Delete 1 profile code(ex:aaaaa) for 1 salesman type (merchandiser), auto remove other salesman type(presales, van sales) associated to the profile code(ex:aaaaa)
      RootCaused: Doesn't check on the operation type 
      Solution: Do a checking on operation type before perform delete
      Page Changed: pag_S_StepOfCall 
      Script Changed: 12-FW_SYS_GRID
	
    Issue #4: Unable to delete customer in customer assignment
      RootCaused: Invalid column name join
      Solution: Correct column name
      Page Changed: pag_SS_CustAssign

1. 0068305: Office > Inventory > Inventory Summary - Stock Transfer Out will cause INVT_MASTER having null value at Allocate quantity

Solution: Added Is null funciton to change null to zero
 - Page Chnaged: pag_I_StkAdj_NewGeneral

2.0067053: [Office]>Inventory>Stock Out: All records listed if no status checkbox is ticked 
Root cause: The where condition was not added in the select .
Solution: Added accordingly
Page Chnaged: pag_I_StkOut

3. 0068391: Login BO>Master Maintenance>Route> Need to re-login to see the updated changes
Root Cause : table SYS_USER_TREE was not updated after saving position changes (table SYS_USER_TREE only updated during login)
Solution : call stored proc "SBE_SYS_USER_GEOTREE" after clicking "save" button to update table SYS_USER_TREE
Page Changes : pag_AC_GT_Position_Edit

<Debbie Yeo>
1. 0067639: Transaction > Order / Invoice > not able entitle promo if having similar promo code ( incorrrect string comparison method)
Root Cause: Current promotion validation code will apply multiple promotion based on promotion code in alphabetical order, if subsequent promotion code can be found as part of previous promotion code, it will be treated as same promotion and will not apply it.
Solution: Change the string comparison method of previous promotion code and subsequent promotion code to be full string checking instead of wildcard type. 
File changed: Promotion.gcs

Date             : 2015-04-28
Baseline version : 7.1.0.0-20150428
Available in     : 7.1.0.0-20150428A
Engine Version   : R5OfficeEngine_5.8.0.9.Net4.0_TEST20150421
Builder Version  : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.13_TEST20150318

<Sung Chun>
1. #0063565: Transaction > Order/ Van Sales > incorrect total disc if entitle promo 1A with cust grp disc 5%
Root Cause: Previous fixes on mantis 0061751 cause the calculation method different and get different amount.
Solution: Revert to correct version.
File Changed: pag_TO_NewGeneral, pag_TO_EditGeneral, pag_TI_NewGeneral, pag_TI_EditGeneral, Promotion.gcs

Remark: 
Example:
cust_group_disc = 5%, list price = 125.95, decimalsetting = 2
UOM = CS(2CTN), CTN(10EA), EA (default uom)
Calculation method:
cust_group_disc amt = round((125.95 * 5%),decimalsetting) = 6.30
6.30 * 100 = 630 (customer group discount amount)

Promotion = 10%
promotion on cust_group_disc:
125.95 - 6.3 = 119.65
round((119.65 * 10%),decimalsetting) = 11.97
11.97 / 1 (default uom smallest conv) * 10 (buying uom smallest conv) * 10 (quantity) = 1197 (promotion discount amount)

Total Discount Amount = 1197 + 630 = 1827

Promotion not on cust_group_disc:
round((125.95 * 10%),decimalsetting) = 12.60
12.60 / 1 (default uom smallest conv) * 10 (buying uom smallest conv) * 10 (quantity) = 1260 (promotion discount amount)

Total Discount Amount = 1260 + 630 = 1890

=========================================================
Date             : 2015-04-28
Baseline version : 7.1.0.0-20150427
Available in     : 7.1.0.0-20150428
Engine Version   : R5OfficeEngine_5.8.0.9.Net4.0_TEST20150421

Date             : 2015-03-03
Baseline version : 7.1.0.0-20150302
Available in     : 7.1.0.0-20150303
Engine Version   : R5OfficeEngine_5.8.0.8-b.Net4.0
Builder Version  : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.12

<Weng Onn>
1. 0058370: Customer>Geo Tree>Geo Tree that have been started and not yet ended can be deleted
Root Cause: The HH submitted start date with time stamp, e.g 2014-10-30 19:36:07.717, however the grid only capture start date in date format only
Solution: Enhanced the delete statement and update statement to handle timestamp, added the staement CAST(CAST(EFF_START_DT AS DATE) AS varchar(10)) = #grd_GeoTree.dat_StartDate#
Root Cause1: SBE_MST_ROUTECUST and USP_OA_FW_GEO_NODE_CUST_UNASSIGN stored procedure only handle date format for start date only
Solution1: Added CAST(CAST(C.EFF_START_DT AS DATE) AS varchar(10)) = @EFF_START_DT  in stored proc
Root Cause2: dateOverlapValidation function only handle date format start date
Solution2: Added CAST(CAST(EFF_START_DT AS DATE) AS varchar(10)) condition in the dateOverlapValidation function
File Changed: pag_MC_GeoTree.page

<Koon Leong>

1.0060857: Master Maintenance | Sales Person | Sales Person Details > found able save for overlapping periods by edit the start& end date
Root Cause1: The update command of gridlist using wrong start and end date control

Root Cause2: The grd_List.OnUpdateError refer to wrong control
Solution2: changed the control from this.grd_List.N_ROUTE_CD to this.grd_List.E_ROUTE_CD in grd_List.OnUpdateError
Root Cause3: No today date checking for start date in grd_List.OnInserting event
Solution3: Added the start date must greater than or eqaul to today checking

Release Note For Standard DMSOne Office Application
=========================================================
Date             : 2014-09-12

Engine Version   : 5.8.0.6-a.Net4.0

1. 0057897: Transaction > VMI > Add & Edit > Script Error when Product only has one UOM

	- Full pallet became 38*2 = 76 (should be 75 EA)
- Solution: make sure no rounding when it is EVEN number of half pallet
Page Changed: pag_TOP_NewGeneral

5. Issue: India > Transaction > Order / Invoice > taxable amount and non-taxable amount is wrongly calculated
   - RootCause: the amount is sum up with all product line's gross amount and deducted with customer discount amount, which is wrong (India taxation is different)

                     pag_TI_NewGeneral_IT, pag_TI_EditGeneral_IT

   - Page Changed: pag_MPromo_PromoCat

0056305: DIST>Transaction>Pick List - 3 records with same picklist no created when user save pick list

2. One product, multiple MRP, volume and weight calculation will be wrong in the picklist listing.
3. Each split mrp should contain their own weight and volume in pick list detail page. should not total up everything.
4. 3 records with same picklist no created in the pick list listing 
5. no message prompt when user key in the non exist/wrong batch code 
6. not able to convert to default unit when user set the unit for volume and weight in product is not the default unit

this is because when Create new Company Invoice, Bin allocation data is not tie to individual UOM, it is tie to combination of all UOM under same product and MRP

<Tho>
1. 0056197: India: Transaction>ComapnyInvoice - Script error when edit Reason, missing save icon when edit Tax Detail
Issue 1: Script error happen
- RootCause: Sql issue
- Solution: fix script
Issue 2: Notice save tax detail button missing, save icon next to the tax detail also missing
- RootCause: Edit mode causing the issue
- Solution: remove edit mode, allow user direct edit data through view mode
Issue 3: prompt message to ask user enter mandatory fields. Unable to perform delete
- RootCause: no REQUIREVALIDATOR control apply
- Solution: apply REQUIREVALIDATOR control, apply delete logic
Issue 4: Invoice field not accept special character '-'
- RootCause: -
- Solution: No change require, txn_no normally does not accept special character *&^^%$$-
Issue 5: What is the Tax (%) 10.00 and 923.80 value in the attached India_CompInv_Add_2 for?
- RootCause: inherit from Existing Company Invoice
- Solution: not in used, already remove it

2. 0056204: India: TRx>Company Invoice - Amount currency still show RM and some amount field without currency unit
Issue 1: wrong currency unit used (RM). Should refer to set_initial field for the correct currency unit. Some amount field also dun have the currency unit.
- RootCause: the Currency unit is getting from SET_MASTER.CURRENCY, 
	user allow to change through BO > Setting > Company Info
- Solution: -
Issue 2: Tax Rate field in Edit page and black column in Add page. From the design spec from Wendy, Tax Rate should not include
- RootCause: Inherit from Original Company Invoice
- Solution: remove Tax Rate column from prd grid

3. Transaction - Company Invoice(India Tax) - View Mode
- Update header layout according to spec

<Venice Chan>
1.0055383: Setting | India Legislation | MMR > Add > Level empty and able key in more than 2 decimal for each margin, date issue
Root cause:
	1. Level empty in Add Product Hierarchy popup screen.
	2. User able to key in 2 decimal for each margin.
 	3. Start date, End date default value is incorrect.
 	4. Enter max 50 char for desc, can't view all.
Solution: 
 	1. Remove Level in Add Product Hierarchy popup screen. Level column is not needed.
 	2. Ensure only allow key in 2 decimal for each margin.
 	3. Start date should default to tomorrow date, not today's date.
 	4. End Date should be empty , not default to 9999, if distributor is not default.
 	5. Increase the width for MMR description.
File change: pag_S_MMR_AddDist, pag_S_MMR_AddProduct, pag_S_MMR_Edit, pag_S_MMR_New, pag_S_MMR_View

	- Found Default show N.

Solution: Apply checking on The combination of Tax Definition, Tax Rate and Calculated On.
File change: pag_S_TaxRate

4.0055018: Setting > India Legislation > Tax Rate > Add > [Tax Rate] not able to input decimal

File change:pag_S_TaxRate

5.0055244: India > Setting > India Legislation > Tax Rate > Sort > Error
Root cause: Sorting Variable return null
Solution: Fix the Sorting variable accordingly
File change:pag_S_TaxRate

<Yu Tien>
Security Requirements Enhancements:
  1. System Password Policy:
     - Password will expire
     - Apply minimum password age
     - Apply password history
     - Apply minimum password length
     - Account will be locked on failed login attempts
     - Passwords must contain characters from
       - English characters
       - English uppercase and lowercase characters
       - Numeric
       - Non-alphanumeric
     - Don't allow user id in password string
     - Don't allow blacklist text in password string
  2. Setup SMTP information in System Profile screen.
  3. User Password Policy(Individual user can difference password policy, is mean can overwrite System Password Policy).
  4. Temp Password Date for reset password.
File Changed 	 : DBXmlDT.gcs, pag_AC_SystemProfile.page, pag_AC_User.page, pag_AC_User_Edit.page, pag_AC_User_New.page, pag_AC_User_View.page, pag_ChangePassword.page

File Changed 	: pag_TC_ChqProcessing.page

5. 0049899	: Transaction | Collection | Payment to Supplier | Add Payment to Supplier > incorrect PAy AMount when apply all

File Changed 	: pag_TC_NormalEntry_General.page, pag_TC_Payment_To_Supplier_General.page

Date		 : 2013-11-15
Baseline version : 6.0.0.1-20131114
Available in	 : 6.0.0.1-20131115
Engine Version   : 5.8.0.3 .Net4.0
Builder Version  : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.7

<Mei Yen>
1.0048611: HQ>Sys Config>MM>Product - Error when user add new grid column for default setting
Root Cause: for pivot field will fail to pass syntax checking 
Solution: 
	- only perform syntax checking upon saving
	- for FIELD_TYPE=PIVOT: will hardcode the following field value
		- TITLE = PIVOT_TITLE
		- FIELD_NAME = PIVOT_FIELD_NAME
		- SORT_BY = PIVOT_FIELD_NAME
		- SOURCE = PIVOT_FIELD_NAME
	- for FIELD_TYPE=PIVOT, FIELD_EXPRESSION will be SQL Statement that return PIVOT_FIELD_NAME and PIVOT_TITLE
File Changed: pag_FW_SYS_GRID_RootNew, pag_FW_SYS_GRID_RootEdit, pag_FW_SYS_GRID_COL_PopupNew, pag_FW_SYS_GRID_COL_PopupEdit, pag_FW_SYS_GRID_COL_PopupView

2. System Configuratin Tool | Dynamic Grid | Default Setting Enhancement
- General Information: Add [Sel From Existing] button above From Clause, Precondition, to allow the user to select from existing From Clause/Precondition
- Grid Filter: 
	- [Sel Tbl.Fld]: 
		- Field Description : Default according to existing record, the one be referred most frequently, if no existing setting, use Blank , perform checking upon saving
		- Default Field Operator/Field Operator: Default according to existing record, the one be referred most frequently.
	- Direct Field
		- Field Description : Default according to existing record, the one be referred most frequently, if no existing setting, use Blank , perform checking upon saving
		- Default Field Operator/Field Operator: Default according to existing record, the one be referred most frequently.
	- Data Type: options from Builder+Integer
	- Mask: options from FW_CULTURE_INFO
- Grid Column: 
	- [Sel Tbl.Fld]: 
		- Title : Default according to existing record, the one be referred most frequently, if no existing setting, use Blank , perform checking upon saving
	- Direct Field
		- Title : Default according to existing record, the one be referred most frequently, if no existing setting, use Blank , perform checking upon saving

- Re-position: move Field Type to the top of the form

3. 0049468: Dynamic Grid > Default Setting > Grid Filter > error when add new filter

<Ciew Lun>
1. 	0049232: Decentralize>DIST>Merchandising>Merchandising Activity>POSM Material Req - View detail and approved by user is blank
Root Cause: Table FW_User is not download to Decentralize as not needed. But 2 material request table need to keep track user name that approve the Request.
Solution:  As discussed, will add 1 more column called "User_Name" and insert the user name when approve/reject, and download only this table to decentralize.
Office will add User Name into the table when Approve/Reject, and retrieve the value directly from the table, without joining fw_user

4. 0048127: Dynamic Call Card | Dynamic Call Card Setting | Assignment > found assigned distributor in the listing is not filter by geo tree
Solution: 
	- Dynamic Call Card Setting | Assignment | Assignment Type = Distributor > Join SYS_USER_TREE by G_DIST
	- Dynamic Call Card Setting | Assignment | Assignment Type = Customer > Join SYS_USER_TREE by G_CUST
	- Dynamic Call Card Result >  Join SYS_USER_TREE by G_DIST
	* Please take note that Dynamic Call Card Setting | Assignment | Assignment Type = Route Operation Type do not apply geo tree
File Changed: pag_M_SURVEY_ASSIGNMENT_edit, pag_SurveyResult

	- code error, missing clear whereCond

	1-1. re-release delete access right alter script

1. 0048162: Decentralize>DIST>Transaction>Collection>Cheque Processing-Update status, sync not successful

Changed: pag_TC_ChqProcessing

<Mei Yen>
1. #0047432: Dynamic Call Card > Dynamic Call Card > New > Not able to Save record
Root cause: Effective End Date format is wrong.
Solution: Get dbValue instead of value of Effective End Date.
File changed: pag_M_SURVEY_RootEdit, pag_M_SURVEY_RootNew

2. #47475: HQ>Dynamic Call Card>Dynamic Call Card Setting>New>Unable to Save record for Form type
Root cause: field is not null, but GROUP_UI_TYPE is not applicable for Survey Type: F-Form
Solution: Change field to be nullable
Field Changed: dbo.M_SURVEY.table.sql

3.#47478: HQ>Dynamic Call Card>Dynamic Call Card Setting>Question>Unable to update record
Root cause: There is no add/update function to save data into Hidden grid of Processing page and set TrackChangeStatus (TCG_LogicDetail) to false, hence CuaseTrackChange will be invoke when update questions
Solution: Upon Question Pages CauseTrackChange are invoking, if trigger/change page is from Processing, continue the action, escalate to TrackChangeGroup: TCG_Question and Set TrackChangeStatus of TCG_LogicDetail to false;
File Changed: pag_M_SURVEY_QUESTION, pag_M_SURVEY_QUESTION_PopupEdit and pag_M_SURVEY_QUESTION_PopupNew 

4.#47499: HQ > DCC > DCC Setting > New > Group Detail > Delete > Incorrect error message when Delete Group 1
Root cause: wrong sentence
Solution: change as request
File Changed: pag_M_SURVEY_GROUP_RootEdit, pag_M_SURVEY_GROUP_RootNew

5. #47484: HQ>Dynamic Call Card>Dynamic Call Card Setting>Question>Unable to select multiple no of pictures
Root cause: Feedback from Kwee Mui - Currently can only support single picture and will support multiple in the future. Alternatively, we can just hide it and show it in future when we can support multiple
Solution: Set visible to false
File Changed: pag_M_SURVEY_QUESTION_PopupNew, pag_M_SURVEY_QUESTION_PopupEdit

=========================================================
Date		 : 2013-08-28
Baseline version : 6.0.0.0-20130827
Available in	 : 6.0.0.0-20130828
Engine Version   : 5.8.0.2.Net4.0_20130820
Builder Version  : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.5_20130726

<Hui Sun>
1. 0046517, 0046680: Inventory > Stock Receipt > insert failed
Root caused: Transaction number mismatch number due to the InsertCommand that consists od TRANSACTION and TRY CATCH, with InsertCommandTransaction flag set to true.
Solution: Set the flag to false, remove the TRY CATCH in the InsertCommand to ensure the desired error number being return.
File changed: pag_I_StkReceipt_NewGeneral_Bin

2. 0046603: Inventory > Bin Transfer > Add Bin Transfer - Incorrect message returned when transfer Qty > Inventory Qty
Root caused: Transaction number mismatch number due to the InsertCommand that consists od TRANSACTION and TRY CATCH, with InsertCommandTransaction flag set to true.
Solution: Set the flag to false, remove the TRY CATCH in the InsertCommand to ensure the desired error number being return.
File changed: pag_I_BinTransfer_NewGeneral

3. 0046607: Inventory > Bin Transfer > Transfer Loose Pallet > Assign Pick Area - Insert Failed when click on the Save button
Root caused: Transaction number mismatch number due to the InsertCommand that consists od TRANSACTION and TRY CATCH, with InsertCommandTransaction flag set to true.
Solution: Set the flag to false, remove the TRY CATCH in the InsertCommand to ensure the desired error number being return.
File changed: pag_I_BinTransfer_TrfLoosePallet_Dtl

4. 0046561: Inventory > Warehouse Transfer > Add Warehouse Transfer - Insert Failed
Root caused: Transaction number mismatch number due to the InsertCommand that consists od TRANSACTION and TRY CATCH, with InsertCommandTransaction flag set to true.
Solution: Set the flag to false, remove the TRY CATCH in the InsertCommand to ensure the desired error number being return.
File changed: pag_I_WhsTrf_NewGeneral_Bin

5. 0046555: Inventory > Stock Adjustment > Add - Insert failed when adjust quantity greater than the available quantity in the warehouse
Root caused: Transaction number mismatch number due to the InsertCommand that consists od TRANSACTION and TRY CATCH, with InsertCommandTransaction flag set to true.
Solution: Set the flag to false, remove the TRY CATCH in the InsertCommand to ensure the desired error number being return.
File changed: pag_I_StkAdj_NewGeneral

6. 0046522: Inventory > Stock Receipt > Add Stock Receipt -System ISNOT overwrite the new quantity/Expiry date/cost price that been entered
Root caused: Attempt to assign value from an invisible date picker. 
Solution: Add to check if date picker control is visible and not null before get the value.
File changed: pag_I_StkReceipt_NewGeneral

7. 0046557: Inventory > Cost Modification > Add Cost Modification - Insert failed
Root caused: Duplicate declaration of variables in the Insert command. 
Solution: Remove the duplicated codes from the Insert command.
File changed: pag_I_CostMod_NewGeneral

1. #0046742: Master Maintenance > Customer > Geo Tree > duplicate geo tree in the dropdown
Root Cause: 
	a) No sorting.
	b) Only display Description.
	c) No set width value.
	d) No convert data type.
Solution:
	a) Add sorting. 
	b) Display ID and Description together.
	c) Set width value.
	d) Convert data type to varchar for display. 
File Changed: pag_MC_GeoTree

<Ciew Lun>
1) 0046552: DIST > Master Maintenance > Must Sell List > prompt error when click on Hyeprlink codes
Root Cause: Inherited Issue when setting Start Date Property to Disable in Edit Page, during View Mode, the page is not initiated
Solution: Add the checking on the Edit page initiated, only run the setting of Start Date Property.
Changed: pag_M_MustSellList

2) Disable the Sorting of Audit Data Comparison as Requested by QA Team.
Changed: pag_TXN_AUDIT_DATA_View

3) Change Audit Trail Pop Up Size from 900 to 1000, to prevent the feel of "overlap"
Changed: root

4) 0046548: Master Maintenance > Supplier > Delete > Deleted Supplier record still shown in UI
Root Cause: Did not reload the grid list after the deletion event.
Solution: Reload the GridList on deleted event.
Changed: pag_M_Supplier

5) 0046589: Master Maintenance > Order Population Template > Delete > Error message when Delete record
Root Cause: Ilist>Grid Collapse Changed, will get the wherecond from SysFilter set in db table, which might contain sql function, and fail to run in .net when Grid.Select(wherecond)
Solution: Add this.whereCond = ""; to prevent the case mention above, for all the ilist page across the project.
Changed: pag_M_Messaging,pag_M_MustSellList,pag_M_OrderPopulationTemplate,pag_M_Supplier,pag_S_NotificationSetup

MANTIS LOG : 0040259


Transaction | Invoice | Add Invoice>System doesn't prompt warning message when cust credit limit is over.

Test Version: 5.0.1.0-20120809.464 |5.7.0.1.S.316
 Test Date: 20120810
 Tested By: William
 
Pre condition:
 1. Set CUST01 credit limit 1000
 2. Set Maintenance>Customer>Options>Credit Limit Checking=YES
 3. Set Master Maintenance>Distributor>Options>Credit Limit Checking=Warning
 
Steps to simulate:
 1. Login as DIST user
 2. Go to Transaction | Invoice | Add Invoice 
3. Select CUST01
 4. Add product 
5. Ensure total invoice amt > credit limit
 6. Click promotion, click save
 7. FOund out system allow to save without prompt warning message
 
Expected Result:
 1. System should prompt warning message when user click save button


ROOT CAUSED : Access ID for the Distributor was not defined.
SOLUTION    : Grant Other Access (CL) when Check Invoice Credit Limit is Warning Only.
Changes     : Modified the existing page "pag_MD_Options.page".

MANTIS LOG: 0040453

Transaction | Exchange> Unable to multiple process exchange record
 

Test Version: 5.0.1.0-20120824.487 |5.7.0.1.S.316
 Test Date: 20120830
 Tested By: William
 
Steps to simulate:
 1. Login as DIST user
 2. Go to Transaction | Exchange
 3. Select few exchange record that required stock movement
 4. Click process exchange
 5. System prompts "need to assign bin batch'
 6. Assigned and click save
 7. FOund out system only process 1 excahnge record (refer exchange8.png,9,10,11)
 8. Select few exchange record without stock movement and click process
 9. Found out system only process 1 exchange record (refer exchange12.png,12,14)
 
Expected Result:
 1. For processing exchange with stock movement, Processing Summary screen prompted (Exchange that process successfully will count into Succeed and if not able to process will count into Failed) :
 Succeed : x record(s)
 Failed : x record(s)
 
Result:
 ExchangeNo001 need to assign bin batch
 ExchangeNo003 need to assign bin batch
 
** Hyperlink for ExchangeNo in Result listing.
 
2. User can select the ExchangeNo001 hyperlink to proceed to assign bin batch.
3. After process back to the Processing Summary screen and select another ExchangeNo003 to process.
 
4. For processing exchange without stock movement, Processing Summary screen prompted (Exchange that process successfully will count into Succeed and if not able to process will count into Failed)



Solution    : Add a new page to show failed transactions with Exchange No in hyperlink, user can click on the hyperlink to edit the
              exchange details and do modifition and reprocess it.   
File changed: pag_T_Exchange.page
File Added  : pag_SelExchange.page

Root Cause: Databind for the promotion grid list did not take effect when user untick the selection.
Solution: Make the grid list always auto data bind on user selection.
File Changed: pag_T_SelPromo

2. Promotion calculate wrong value.
Root Cause: Product Discount was rounding to 2 decimal before multiply with buying quantity.
Solution: Round the value only after multiply with buying quantity.
File Changed: Promotion.gcs

3. Print All button in Invoice listing page.
Root Cause: Unwanted button.
Solution: Remove the button.
File Changed: pag_T_Invoice

    Page Changed: - pag_MC_ShipTo

Date		 : 2011-07-07
Baseline version : 5.0.0.1-20110630
Available in	 : 5.0.0.1-20110707
Engine Version   : R5OfficeEngine_5.7.0.1.S.169
Builder Version  : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.1.S.43

<John Tan Chuan Leong>

1.)
0034352: Survey > Survey Setting > Select product survey> Survey detail > Edited survey question changed after sorting in grid view.
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - Data has been filled into the edit layout again when the sorting event is fired.
    Solution    : - Do not execute any function to fill in the data into the edit layout
    Page Changed: - pag_Survey_Format_P

2.)
0034357: Survey>Survey Setting>Add new survey>click next> Add new question> Click Back> Click Next> Notice that added question is missing
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - Recreating the design layout function has been triggered when the next button is clicked
    Solution    : - Cancel out the function that recreates the whole design layout to avoid the data reload.
    Page Changed: - pag_SurveyNew_Step_1

3.)
0034369: Survey > Result > Q&A /Prod> Answer is showing Y/N for boolean and code for multiple answer
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - It will display answer code when ref_value is null in set_ref table  
    Solution    : - take out the E.REF_PARAM = D.MKTSVY_ANSCD in inner join sql statement in the "RPT_SURVEY_QA_RESULT" store procedure
    Page Changed: - pag_Survey_Result

4.)
0034387: Survey > Survey Settings > Survey Details> Cannot select another tab due to validation.
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - 
    Solution    : - No Change is required
    Page Changed: - 

5.)
0034382: Survey > Add new survey > using the back/next button > Information is not kept
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - Same as issue number of 0034357
    Solution    : - Same as issue number of 0034357
    Page Changed: - Same as issue number of 0034357

6.)
0034388: Survey > Survey Setting > Survey Details > Add and delete and readd will increate the question number
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - No re-numbering when the deleting process
    Solution    : - Re-numbering the question number when deleting process
    Page Changed: - pag_Survey_Format_P,pag_Survey_Format_Q

7.)
0034389: Survey > Survey Details >No message prompt on a success Save on a question
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - No message prompt on onInserted event inside the form
    Solution    : - Add message prompt on onInserted event inside the form
    Page Changed: - pag_SurveyNew_Step_P_2,pag_SurveyNew_Step_QA_2

8.)
0034390: Survey > Survey Settings > Add new Q&A survey > Answer code list is not in proper view
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - Page number is set to 20 in the properties
    Solution    : - Set the page number to 10 in the properties
    Page Changed: - pag_Survey_AnswerCode


9.)
0034391: Survey> Survey Settings>survey details > View survey question show wrongly after sorting on the grid view
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - No condition to display correct value for example like '1' then 'Yes' Else 'No'
    Solution    : - Add condition to show meaningful data
    Page Changed: - pag_Survey_Format_Q

10.)
0034393: Survey > Survey Setting > Add New Q&A survey > Answer Code > Search button not filter the data properly
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - No reload method for grid after the searching method
    Solution    : - Add the reload for grid after the searching method
    Page Changed: - pag_Survey_AnswerCode

11.)
0034543: Setting > Grace Period Setup > AR/AP> not able to save if start date and end date is of the same value
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - There is a checking condition that does not allow user to enter current date value for end date
    Solution    : - Modify the checking condition that allows user to enter current date as end date
    Page Changed: - pag_S_G_SlsPeriod

Release Note For FC DMSOne Office Application
=========================================================
Date		 : 2011-06-30
Baseline version : 5.0.0.1-20110616B
Available in	 : 5.0.0.1-20110630
Engine Version   : R5OfficeEngine_5.7.0.1.S.169
Builder Version  : R5OfficeBuilder_5.8.0.1.S.43

<John Tan Chuan Leong>

1.)
0034418: Setting > User Maintenance > User > Assign Role ID > Found no localization on Role Id
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - There is no "Role Id" in the resource editor
    Solution    : - Make it to be "Role ID" inside the grd_List
    Page Changed: - pag_SelRole

2.)
0031449: Setting > Tax > Tax Group > Tax (%) should not allow to be 0
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : -
    Solution    : - Issue has been resolved in base version
    Page Changed: - 

3.)
0034300: Setting > User Maintenance > Data Access assignment for distributor should allow to save all in one tick.
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - There is no any build-in method to maintain the states of checkbox ticked by users 
    Solution    : - Create methods to keep the ticked records and populate it when needed.
    Page Changed: - pag_SelHQDataAccess

4.)
0034394: Setting > User Maintenance > User > Change Password > Password is allowed to repeat to old password
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - There is no method to check the password history of the user 
    Solution    : - Execute the build-in method which is "this.Eng.PowerCheck.PasswordHistoryCheck(..)"
    Page Changed: - pag_ChangePassword

5.)
0034460: Setting > Reference Data >Sales Calendar >Update >DB: Version and syncoperation are not up to date
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - There is no update for version and syncoperation fields in sql query 
    Solution    : - Go to editLayout of frm_main and then add in "VERSION=VERSION+1" and "SYNCOPERATION='U'" in the updating sql query statement
    Page Changed: - pag_SR_SalesCalendar

6.)
0031508: Setting > Reference Data >Sales Calendar >Found error as attached
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : -
    Solution    : - Cannot simulate the errors
    Page Changed: - 

7.)
0034485: Setting > Reference Data > Aging Term/Dueing Aging Bucket > aging code is allowed to setup out of sequence
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - There is no method to check the overlapping 
    Solution    : - Write a sql statement to retrieve data and then execute this method "this.Eng.DB.ExecuteScalar("",sql1,null)" therefore check.
    Page Changed: - pag_SR_AgingTerms

8.)
0032535: Setting > Reference Data > Invoice Terms > Edit Record > Invoice Due Days is greater than Terms Days
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : -
    Solution    : - Issue has been resolved in base version
    Page Changed: - 


9.)
Setting > User Maintenance > User Role > Assign Module ID > Found no localization on Module Id
Remarks:
    Root Cause  : - There is no "Module Id" in the resource editor
    Solution    : - Make it to be "Module ID" inside the grd_List
    Page Changed: - pag_SelModule

0034268: Transaction> Credit Note> Add new Credit Note> Assign Bin Batch> Bin Location textbox should have mandatory indicator

    Page Changed: - pag_TCN_AssignBinBatch.page

0034275: Transaction > Debit Note > Not able to sort in Edit Debit Note screen
Remarks:
    Root Cause: - Did not set data field name at the SortBy(GRIDCOLUMN Properties) which use to sort the data in the grid column
    Solution  : - Set the data field name at SortBy(GRIDCOLUMN Properties) for all the field display on the grid(grd_e_Prd)
    Page Changed: - pag_TCN_EditGeneral.page

0034271: Transaction > Credit Note > Prompt "Invalid Invoice Number" when key in a valid invoice number
Remarks:
    Root Cause: - Unable to retrieve the inv_key if direct key in Invoice number
    Solution  : - Retrieve the inv_key by matching the inv_no,cust_cd,dist_cd and slsman_cd in txn_invoice table(sel_n_Inv_No.OnTextChanged)
    Page Changed: - pag_TCN_NewGeneral.page

0034261: Transaction> Exchnage> Add Exchange> Notice unable to search for transfer in 'inactive product'.
Remarks:
    Root Cause: - Filter to select active product only
    Solution  : - Change the filtering at select statement to select all the product which is active and inactive for 'Exchange In Product Code'
 		  (set mst_prd.status not equal to block('B'))grd_List
    Page Changed: - pag_SelDistPrd.page

    Solution: - Changed to save the Balance as "Balance - Soft Allocate - Hard Allocate".

    Root Cause: - Balance saved as "Balance - Hard Allocate".
    Solution: - Changed to save the Balance as "Balance - Soft Allocate - Hard Allocate".
    Page Changed: - pag_MPromo_List_BudgetAllocation

(3) Master > Promotion > Budget Allocation (Area)
    Root Cause: - Balance saved as "Budget - Hard Allocate" and also update the Soft Allocate and Hard Allocate.
    Solution: - Changed to update only the Budget.
    Page Changed: - pag_MPromo_List_BudgetAllocation
    Page Changed: - pag_MPromo_List_BudgetAllocation_Area

(4) Master > Promotion > Budget Allocation (Region)
    Root Cause: - Balance saved as "Budget - Hard Allocate" and also update the Soft Allocate and Hard Allocate.
    Solution: - Changed to update only the Budget.
    Page Changed: - pag_MPromo_List_BudgetAllocation
    Page Changed: - pag_MPromo_List_BudgetAllocation_Region

(5) Master > Promotion > Promotion Monitor
    Root Cause: - Balance is excluded Soft Allocated.
    Solution: - Included Soft Allocated to Balance.
    Page Changed: - pag_MPromo_PromoMonitor

(6) Master > Promotion > Promotion Monitor > View Promotion (Pop-up)
    Root Cause: - Balance is excluded Soft Allocated (Region and Area).
    Solution: - Included Soft Allocated to Balance (Region and Area).
    Page Changed: - pag_MPromo_PromoMonitor_Detail

(7) Master > Promotion > Budget Allocation
    Root Cause: Budget amount is allowed to save and it only check whether the amount less than Hard Allocation.
    Solution: - Changed to only allowed to save when Budget amount is greater than Total of Soft Allocation and Hard Allocation.
    Page Changed: - pag_MPromo_List_BudgetAllocation

(8) Transaction > Invoice / Order > Apply Promotion
    Root Cause: - Promotion budget exceed message prompt. It check whether order/invoice promo amount greater than promo balance.
    Solution: - Included the Soft Allocate to Promo Balance when do the checking.
    Page Changed: - Promotion

(9) Transaction > Invoice > Confirm Invoice
    Root Cause: - Promotion budget exceed message prompt. It check whether invoice promo amount greater than promo balance.
    Solution: - Included the Soft Allocate to Promo Balance when do the checking.
    DB Changed: - SBE_CONFIRM_INVOICE

    Page Changed: - pag_VI_StkReq

0033241: Inventory > Stock Adjustment > found 'Allocated Quantity' and 'Adjustable Quantity' is not auto-populated based expiry date.
Remarks:
    Root Cause: - No checking with the key-in quantity with the adjustable quantity.
    Solution: - Applied the quantity checking and pop up a message if value was invalid.
    Page Changed: - pag_I_StkAdj_NewGeneral_ExpDt

0033328: Transaction > Invoice > found txn_invpromo removed if direct re-apply promotion without any editing for picked Order
Remarks:
(1) Transaction > Order > Promotion > Apply: Promotion budget exceed message prompt even balance still less than promo discount.
    Root Cause: - It compare the discount value with the (Balance - Soft Allocate).
    Solution: - Compare only the Balance whether less than discount value.
    Page Changed - Promotion

(2) Transaction > Order > Promotion > Apply: Discount Amount is displayed from the listing.
    Root Cause: - Both values of Discount fields does not been cleared when promotion is over budget.
    Solution: - Clear the values and recalculate the discount.
    Page Changed - Promotion

(3) Transaction > Order > Process Order: Promotion Block windows pop-up.
    Root Cause: - It take the balance as "BALANCE - SOFT_ALLOC - HARD_ALLOC" to check whether it is less than Discount Amount.
    Solution: - Changed to take the balance as "BALANCE" amount to check the Promotion Block.
    DB Changed: - SBE_PROCESS_ORDER

(4) Transaction > Invoice > Deallocate: BALANCE and SOFT_ALLOC has been updated even CLAIMABLE_IND = 0.
    Root Cause: - No condition with the checking CLAIMABLE_IND = 1.
    Solution: - Update the BALANCE and SOFT_ALLOC when CLAIMABLE_IND = 1.
    DB Changed: - SBE_DEALLOCATE_INVOICE

	Solution: 	- Do not check against SYNCOPERATION so will update if record exist
	Page Changed: 	- pag_I_WhsTrf_NewGeneral_ExpDt.page

1.Fix Issue: 0028809
2.Fix Issue: 0029141
3.Master > Promotion > Promotion Header > Claim Type
   - For promo & deal, the claim type are :
       1. ZNSC    NATIONAL TRP CLAIM
       2. ZOTH    OTHER CLAIMs
       3. ZTHF    FGT DC&HANDLING FEE
       4. ZZC4    WHOLESALES DISCOUNT
       5. ZZLP    LOCAL PROMOTION FEE
       6. ZZT5    CATERING CLAIM
       7. ZZT6    MERCHANPROMO EXPENSE
   - For space buy, the claim type are:
       1. ZLF2    FGT Listing Fee
       2. ZNSF    FGT SHELF SPACE FEE
4.Inventory > Stock Out > Type
   1. MR / QC : Reason code based on reason type = 'RB'
   2. OT : Reason code based on reason type = 'SO'
   3. PU : Reason code based on reason type = 'SO' And REF_VALUE3 = 'PURCH'
